scripts.deploy:kovan: npm run prepare:kovan && npm run build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ irvollo/growth-defi-kovan
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npm run build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ irvollo/growth-defi
